Uses of Class
php.java.bridge.DynamicJavaBridgeClassLoader

Packages that use DynamicJavaBridgeClassLoader
php.java.bridge PHP/Java Bridge core classes and interfaces. 
 

Uses of DynamicJavaBridgeClassLoader in php.java.bridge
 

Methods in php.java.bridge that return DynamicJavaBridgeClassLoader
 DynamicJavaBridgeClassLoader DynamicJavaBridgeClassLoader.clearVMLoader()
          The VM associates a map with each loader to speed up Class.forName().
static DynamicJavaBridgeClassLoader DynamicJavaBridgeClassLoader.newInstance(java.lang.ClassLoader parent)
          Create an instance of the dynamic java bridge classloader It may return null due to security restrictions on certain systems, so don't use this method directly but call: new JavaBridgeClassLoader(bridge, DynamicJavaBridgeClassLoader.newInstance()) instead.
